body_html: I would not recommend using gradients.h/cc as it is currently under construction and will change frequently (as mentioned in the header file). If you need to auto differentiate your graph, for now, you need to use the python API (see code at tensorflow/python/ops/gradients.py)

body: I would not recommend using gradients.h/cc as it is currently under construction and will change frequently (as mentioned in the header file). If you need to auto differentiate your graph, for now, you need to use the python API (see code at tensorflow/python/ops/gradients.py)
